title: New North Church, Edinburgh
author: Livingston, Josiah.
snippet: The basement of Mary's Chapel entering fromStevenlaw's Close was occupied as a smithy, andwhile Dr Gardner was preaching, I observed littlewreaths of smoke coming through the floor. I wasnot much alarmed till one came and sent a mostpungent odour into my nose, when I started upassured that there was something far wrong.
